speaker: CADE
text: Up Fish Street! Down Saint Magnus’ Corner!

speaker: CADE
text: Kill and knock down! Throw them into Thames!

speaker: CADE
text: What noise is this I hear? Dare any be so bold to

speaker: CADE
text: sound retreat or parley when I command them

speaker: CADE
text: kill?

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              here
               
              they
               
              be
               
              that
               
              dare
               
              and
               
              will
               
              disturb
               
              thee
              .

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
Know
              ,
               
              Cade
              ,
               
              we
               
              come
               
              ambassadors
               
              from
               
              the
               
              King

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
Unto
               
              the
               
              Commons
              ,
               
              whom
               
              thou
               
              hast
               
              misled
              ,

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
And
               
              here
               
              pronounce
               
              free
               
              pardon
               
              to
               
              them
               
              all

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
That
               
              will
               
              forsake
               
              thee
               
              and
               
              go
               
              home
               
              in
               
              peace
              .

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
What
               
              say
               
              you
              ,
               
              countrymen
              ?
               
              Will
               
              you
               
              relent

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
And
               
              yield
               
              to
               
              mercy
               
              whil’st
               
              ’tis
               
              offered
               
              you
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Or
               
              let
               
              a
               
              rabble
               
              lead
               
              you
               
              to
               
              your
               
              deaths
              ?

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Who
               
              loves
               
              the
               
              King
               
              and
               
              will
               
              embrace
               
              his
               
              pardon
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Fling
               
              up
               
              his
               
              cap
               
              and
               
              say
               
              “
              God
               
              save
               
              his
               
              Majesty
              !
              ”

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Who
               
              hateth
               
              him
               
              and
               
              honors
               
              not
               
              his
               
              father
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Henry
               
              the
               
              Fifth
              ,
               
              that
               
              made
               
              all
               
              France
               
              to
               
              quake
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Shake
               
              he
               
              his
               
              weapon
               
              at
               
              us
               
              and
               
              pass
               
              by
              .

speaker: ALL
text:
God
               
              save
               
              the
               
              King
              !
               
              God
               
              save
               
              the
               
              King
              !

speaker: CADE
text: What, Buckingham and Clifford, are you so

speaker: CADE
text: brave?—And, you base peasants, do you believe

speaker: CADE
text: him? Will you needs be hanged with your pardons

speaker: CADE
text: about your necks? Hath my sword therefore broke

speaker: CADE
text: through London gates, that you should leave me at

speaker: CADE
text: the White Hart in Southwark? I thought you

speaker: CADE
text: would never have given out these arms till you had

speaker: CADE
text: recovered your ancient freedom. But you are all

speaker: CADE
text: recreants and dastards, and delight to live in slavery

speaker: CADE
text: to the nobility. Let them break your backs with

speaker: CADE
text: burdens, take your houses over your heads, ravish

speaker: CADE
text: your wives and daughters before your faces. For

speaker: CADE
text: me, I will make shift for one, and so God’s curse

speaker: CADE
text: light upon you all!

speaker: ALL
text:
We’ll
               
              follow
               
              Cade
              !
               
              We’ll
               
              follow
               
              Cade
              !

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Is
               
              Cade
               
              the
               
              son
               
              of
               
              Henry
               
              the
               
              Fifth
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
That
               
              thus
               
              you
               
              do
               
              exclaim
               
              you’ll
               
              go
               
              with
               
              him
              ?

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Will
               
              he
               
              conduct
               
              you
               
              through
               
              the
               
              heart
               
              of
               
              France

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
And
               
              make
               
              the
               
              meanest
               
              of
               
              you
               
              earls
               
              and
               
              dukes
              ?

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Alas
              ,
               
              he
               
              hath
               
              no
               
              home
              ,
               
              no
               
              place
               
              to
               
              fly
               
              to
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Nor
               
              knows
               
              he
               
              how
               
              to
               
              live
               
              but
               
              by
               
              the
               
              spoil
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Unless
               
              by
               
              robbing
               
              of
               
              your
               
              friends
               
              and
               
              us
              .

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Were
               
              ’t
               
              not
               
              a
               
              shame
               
              that
              ,
               
              whilst
               
              you
               
              live
               
              at
               
              jar
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
The
               
              fearful
               
              French
              ,
               
              whom
               
              you
               
              late
               
              vanquishèd
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Should
               
              make
               
              a
               
              start
               
              o’er
               
              seas
               
              and
               
              vanquish
               
              you
              ?

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Methinks
               
              already
               
              in
               
              this
               
              civil
               
              broil

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
I
               
              see
               
              them
               
              lording
               
              it
               
              in
               
              London
               
              streets
              ,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Crying
               
              “
              Villiago
              !
              ”
               
              unto
               
              all
               
              they
               
              meet
              .

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Better
               
              ten
               
              thousand
               
              baseborn
               
              Cades
               
              miscarry

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Than
               
              you
               
              should
               
              stoop
               
              unto
               
              a
               
              Frenchman’s
               
              mercy
              .

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
To
               
              France
              ,
               
              to
               
              France
              ,
               
              and
               
              get
               
              what
               
              you
               
              have
               
              lost
              !

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Spare
               
              England
              ,
               
              for
               
              it
               
              is
               
              your
               
              native
               
              coast
              .

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
Henry
               
              hath
               
              money
              ;
               
              you
               
              are
               
              strong
               
              and
               
              manly
              .

speaker: CLIFFORD
text:
God
               
              on
               
              our
               
              side
              ,
               
              doubt
               
              not
               
              of
               
              victory
              .

speaker: ALL
text:
À
               
              Clifford
              !
               
              À
               
              Clifford
              !
               
              We’ll
               
              follow
               
              the
               
              King
               
              and
               
              Clifford
              !

speaker: CADE
text: Was ever feather so lightly blown to and

speaker: CADE
text: fro as this multitude? The name of Henry the Fifth

speaker: CADE
text: hales them to an hundred mischiefs and makes

speaker: CADE
text: them leave me desolate. I see them lay their heads

speaker: CADE
text: together to surprise me. My sword make way for

speaker: CADE
text: me, for here is no staying!—In despite of the devils

speaker: CADE
text: and hell, have through the very middest of you!

speaker: CADE
text: And heavens and honor be witness that no want of

speaker: CADE
text: resolution in me, but only my followers’ base and

speaker: CADE
text: ignominious treasons, makes me betake me to my

speaker: CADE
text: heels.

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
What
              ,
               
              is
               
              he
               
              fled
              ?
               
              Go
              ,
               
              some
              ,
               
              and
               
              follow
               
              him
              ;

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
And
               
              he
               
              that
               
              brings
               
              his
               
              head
               
              unto
               
              the
               
              King

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
Shall
               
              have
               
              a
               
              thousand
               
              crowns
               
              for
               
              his
               
              reward
              .

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
Follow
               
              me
              ,
               
              soldiers
              .
               
              We’ll
               
              devise
               
              a
               
              means

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
To
               
              reconcile
               
              you
               
              all
               
              unto
               
              the
               
              King
              .
